m_szDocTitle: Tesla (TSLA) Stock Retreats as Q1 Sales Miss Expectations, Jim Cramer's Take - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet Tesla (TSLA) Stock Retreats as Q1 Sales Miss Expectations, Jim Cramer's Take By Rachel Graf | 04/05/16 - 11:26 AM EDT Reprint NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Tesla Motors ( TSLA - Get Report ) stock is gaining by 1.19% to $249.94 in late-morning trading on Tuesday, as the company's 2016 first-quarter global sales of 14,820 vehicles fell short of expectations.  Although first quarter deliveries rose by nearly 50% from the year-ago period, they failed to meet Tesla's forecast for 16,000 deliveries and declined from the 17,400 cars delivered in the previous quarter.  The electric vehicles man
